titleStmt.title: A declaracion of the state, wherin all heretikes dooe leade their liues and also of their continuall indeuer, and propre fruictes, which beginneth in the. 38. chapiter, and so to thende of the woorke. By Iohn Gwynnethe clerke.
Confutacyon of the fyrst parte of Frythes boke
titleStmt.author: Gwynneth, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: [In Fletestrete in the hous of Thomas Berthelet],

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Frith, John. A boke made by John Frith prisoner in the tower of London.
A revised and enlarged edition of: The confutacyon of the fyrst parte of Frythes boke.
The leaf between 12 and 13 is numbered 6.
Running title reads: A declaration of an heretike.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
